attributes.action: Promote the use of free software such as OpenOffice in schools'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Schools should be encouraged to use free and open source software such as OpenOffice. OpenOffice is a good alternative to commercial packages such as Microsoft Office! This provides a direct saving to the schools and parents who want to have the same software packages for the child's use at home.
